[[jsxgraph input-ref-sP1="sP1" input-ref-sP2="sP2" input-ref-sP3="sP3" input-ref-sP4="sP4" input-ref-sP5="sP5" input-ref-sP6="sP6" ]] var board = JXG.JSXGraph.initBoard(divid, { boundingbox: [-4, 8, 7, -2], axis: true, grid: true, showCopyright: false }); // ---------------------------- // Teacher shape (fixed, red) // ---------------------------- var teacherShape = {#base_shape#}; var teacherPts = []; for (var i = 0; i < teacherShape.length; i++) { teacherPts.push( board.create('point', teacherShape[i], { visible: false, fixed: true }) ); } for (var i = 0; i < teacherPts.length; i++) { board.create('segment', [ teacherPts[i], teacherPts[(i + 1) % teacherPts.length] ], { strokeColor: 'red', strokeWidth: 3, fixed: true }); } // ---------------------------- // Student shape (draggable points only) // ---------------------------- var studentShape = {#student_shape#}; var studentPts = []; for (var i = 0; i < studentShape.length; i++) { studentPts.push( board.create('point', studentShape[i], { color: 'blue', snapToGrid: true, withLabel: false }) ); } // Draw edges (non-draggable) for (var i = 0; i < studentPts.length; i++) { board.create('segment', [ studentPts[i], studentPts[(i + 1) % studentPts.length] ], { strokeColor: 'blue', strokeWidth: 2, fixed: true, highlight: false }); } // ---------------------------- // STACK bindings (CRITICAL) // ---------------------------- stack_jxg.bind_point(sP1, studentPts[0]); stack_jxg.bind_point(sP2, studentPts[1]); stack_jxg.bind_point(sP3, studentPts[2]); stack_jxg.bind_point(sP4, studentPts[3]); stack_jxg.bind_point(sP5, studentPts[4]); stack_jxg.bind_point(sP6, studentPts[5]); board.unsuspendUpdate(); [[/jsxgraph]]
